sentences.en: Bees and butterflies pollinate the trees in the orchard.
sentences.cn: 蜜峰与蝴蝶将果园里的树授粉.

sentences.en: Bees pollinate the flowers so the fruits or vegetables blossom each season.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂为花朵授粉让蔬菜瓜果每季开花结果.

sentences.en: Besides turning floral nectar into honey, these hardworking insects also pollinate crops for farmers - for a fee.
sentences.cn: 除了将花蜜转化为蜂蜜, 这些辛勤工作的小虫子为农作物授粉 - 作为报酬给农民.

sentences.en: Farmers rent the bees from bee - keepers pollinate almond and cherry trees every year.
sentences.cn: 农民每年都从养蜂人那里租来蜜蜂为杏树和樱桃树授粉.

sentences.en: Farmers will rent the bees pollinate almond and cherry trees.
sentences.cn: 农夫会从养蜂人那儿租蜜蜂来给杏树和樱桃树授粉.

sentences.en: Flowers of A . yabeana can self - pollinate autonomously , which occurs in middle of receptive period.
sentences.cn: 华北耧斗菜具有自动授粉机制, 授粉发生在柱头可授中期.

sentences.en: In exchange, they enrich the soil, pollinate flowers, and gobble up insect pests.
sentences.cn: 作为交换, 他们丰富的土壤, 花授粉, 并吞噬害虫.

sentences.en: Many garden plants need butterflies to pollinate them.
sentences.cn: 许多园林植物需要蝴蝶授粉他们.

sentences.en: Many kinds of plants, trades trees and grasses need bees to pollinate them.
sentences.cn: 多种作物 、 树木和草类需要蜜蜂为它们授粉.

sentences.en: Many of the indigenous insects are needed to pollinate the local plants.
sentences.cn: 需要很多种土生昆虫给当地植物授粉。

sentences.en: They contract their bees out to farmers pollinate their crops.
sentences.cn: 他们还和农家作好约定,然后把蜜蜂送去帮农家的作物授粉.

sentences.en: To pollinate ( a flower ) by means of cross - pollination.
sentences.cn: 异花传粉用异花传粉的方式传花粉给 ( 花朵 )

sentences.en: Wild bees will naturally then pollinate human crops.
sentences.cn: 野生蜜蜂随之将很自然地帮助人类农作物授粉.

trans.tran_en: to give a flower or plant pollen so that it can produce seeds
to give a flower or plant pollen so that it can produce seeds
